successes.title: Leash and Cuff Minimalist Camera Straps by Peak Design
successes.description: A versatile, quick connecting camera strap - neck strap, sling strap, safety tether and video stabilizer - all in one.

Pledges.description: Preorder Cuff: the baby brother of Leash. Cuff is a quick-connecting camera wrist strap.
Preorder Leash: the ultra-versatile, minimalist camera strap.
Preorder Leash + Cuff: get the most versatile camera strap ever created, along with it's smaller wrist strap counterpart.
Early Bird Special #1: Cuff + Capture Clip = first in line to receive the first Cuffs made, and bundled with a Capture Camera Clip. If you need Cuff before Dec. 25, this is your best bet!
Early Bird Special #2: Leash + Capture = first in line to receive the first Leashes made, and bundled with a Capture Camera Clip. If you need Leash before Dec. 25, this is your best bet!

Early Bird Special #3: Leash + Cuff + Capture = the best deal around! Get first articles of Cuff and Leash, as well as a Capture Clip, sent to you ASAP. If you want the whole shebang before Dec. 25, this is your best bet!
Sleepy Bird #1: Cuff + Capture. Missed out on the Early Bird Specials? Get Cuff + Capture, sent to you as soon as the first set of preorders are fulfilled.
Sleepy Bird #2: Leash + Capture. Missed out on the Early Bird Specials? Get Leash + Capture, sent to you as soon as the first set of preorders are fulfilled.
Sleepy Bird #3: Leash + Cuff + Capture. Missed out on the Early Bird Specials? Get Leash + Cuff + Capture, sent to you as soon as the first set of preorders are fulfilled.
